reviews.review: jai baucoup aimer se jeux car il y a beacoup denigme a resoudre et parfois tres dificile

Очень интересная игра, головоломки зачастую простые, но иногда просто взрывают голову(особенно бесит промежуток с 6 по 7 главу), сюжетная составляющая тоже очень порадовала. Это явно игра не на один разок.

Старая добрая Челл вернулась и снова крушит все в своем репертуаре . Героев в этой части немного , а именно больше чем в прошлой игре всего на 3 персонажа . Доктор что заведовал исследованиями и его ассистентка . Их мы услышим через записи которые найдем по сюжету . Третьем же новым героем выступает маленький модуль по имени Уитли , что разбудил нас от сна . Нам снова нужно остановить ИИ по имени Гладос . Игра привнесла пару новых фишек , типо световых мостов и лазеров с зеркальными кубами . Игра выдержала планку первой части и даже немного перепрыгнула своего родителя , поэтому я ставлю ей 10 кубов-компаньенов из 10
Portal 2 to jedna z najlepszych gier jakie grałem. Grafika jak na te czasy jest świetna. Polecam.
If your smart get it but if you have a regular iq then have fun raging
Отличная игра с интересными головоломками и уникальным сюжетом! Вторая часть умножила хорошие качества первой в разы. Мультиплеер - тоже супер, советую попробовать.
Fajna jest ale czasem są momenty niemożliwe xDD
Very good game. Fun right the way through. Puzzles aren't too difficult or easy. Story is amusing. Got it on sale. It's more than worth the price.
it deleted my savefile and i can't be bothered to play everything again... but its a good game. They need to fix some bugs.

Portal 1 set the stage for a new type of game. It was lovely, sweet, and short. Portal 2 brings vast environments and deep lore. What an absolute masterpiece. The game is long enough to satisfy your Valve cravings yet short enough that it does not get repetitive. 10/10, would play several times over (once I forget the puzzles).

Great game. Incredible multiplayer, especially if you're playing with a personal friend, and the singleplayer's better than the first game. They both ultimately feel like a tech demo and the puzzles can be somewhat underwhelming for fans of the genre, but they're still great regardless
Я не играл в сюжетку, я вообще не увлекаюсь сюжетными играми, но режим для двоих замечательный! Я купил эту игру за 20 рублей еще год назад, но определённо советую хоть за 500 рублей!)

O primeiro jogo foi maravilhoso,depois que joguei esse fiquei mais apaixonado ainda pela serie portal!

Dude, do I need to say anything? One of the coolest Settings and stories in a game, and great puzzles.
i liked this game, and you should too
It's fun. That's all i have to say.
This is a very fun game and is the best in the series!
Se jeux est génial mais il faut creuser sont cerveaux pour y jouer

The puzzle solving in a first person view is wonderful and helps you learn how to solve unusual problems. And like any good game with a level editor and community content, this only makes the game at least three times better.

It is 100x times better than its prequel from every aspect: 
>Better Graphics
>Funny as hell (intersting dialogues, unexpected jokes)
>More gameplay
>New gameplay features

In my opinion you have to play its prequel to enjoy this game and understand the plot.
10/10
-Skang

Hikayesi oldukça güzel ama keşke şu Caroline hakkında daha fazla şey duyabilseydik. Grafikler 2011'e göre oldukça güzel, benimki gibi çöp bir PC'de de böyle oynanması Valve'ın yaptığı güzel bir incelik.

Gioco molto bello anche per chi non ha mai giocato a Portal
The original Portal is a great game , but Portal 2 is much better than Portal 1 !! More content , more challenge , decent soundtrack and great level design !! Thank you, Valve

Игра представляет интересную сюжетную линию , в которой на протяжении всей линии вы будите решать головоломки . Одно из главных отличий от первой части это кооп . головоломки хорошо сделаны как и в одиночке как и в коопе . А в целом  забытый шедевр десятилетия .
Teamwork vad funkar bäst, jo teamwork.

Compelling puzzle game, which is a sequel to the first Portal game.
Compared to that, this game is longer, and concentrates more on the story while at the same time just as fun with the puzzles  as the first game. Now that I mentioned it, the story of this game is great. It's one of the best I've seen, and it's really a game of its own kind, since not many puzzle games have a story this good. Nor are there many puzzle games that would be as fun as this for a long period of time like this game was. Even though it was long, the level design was great and at some points really challenging as well. 
In terms of graphics, this game is beautiful. That is also one aspect where it has improved compared to the first game.
Gameplay is similar to the first Portal, but it has been improved a bit too.
There is also a co-op mode in Portal 2, so if you want to play with a friend after completing the game yourself, that is possible as well.

8/10
хорошая,спокойная,ненапряжная головоломка,прикольное коммьюнити,интересные уровни(так же онлайн хороший). ОЧЕНЬ ХОРОШАЯ ИГРА РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!

Soundtrack 10/10: Idk man it's just a good soundtrack
Gameplay 10/10: Includes everything from the original game (except maybe hyperexcited pellets) and several new features as well. Co-op is great, although I haven't played it very much. Awesome level editor.
Story 9/10: Great story filled with plot twists and the secrets of Aperture, although I do miss Wheatley

Overall rating: 10/10
great, love playing the community's levels some smart people are there really

A perfect continuation of the Portal franchise! I also LOOOOOVE that it's MULTIPLAYER - yes you heard it - M-U-L-T-I-P-L-A-Y-E-R! Oh BTW - there are SOOOOOOO many more Half-Life/Black Mesa references here (and also Rattmann-references)!!!!!!!!!!

Si os gustó el primero...este es igualmente genial y con más horas y más puzzles. Además que con su juego cooperativo (si teneis alguien con quien jugarlo y sino con alguien aleatorio) os hará añadir más horas de gracia y diversión.

Si no habéis jugado al primero, no pasa na´, podéis jugar a este de igual manera.

This game has great graphics,voice acting, characters and storyline. I would recommend playing portal first so there are no spoilers however, i played portal 2 first and it made sense to me very quickly both storyline and puzzle solving\mechanics. Its an all around great game and would definetley recommend getting the orange box or portal bundle.
还未评价，也不用评价，大学时光很重要的游戏，谢谢陪我一起玩的人

Almost as good, if not better than the first game. Its better on story, gameplay and new content. It has amazing level design. Theres also the co-op wich is a bunch of fun.

10/10

Awesome game, it works great on my low end pc and the gameplay is great. The best thing about the game is its co-op mode, I loved playing it with my friend I highly recommend the game to anyone looking for an awesome co-op experience.
IT. IS. THE. BEST. GAME. EVER!
